thread.title_full: Apartment Therapy Editors' Favorite Kitchen Paint Colors — Apartment Therapy

author: The Kitchn
title: Apartment Therapy Editors' Favorite Kitchen Paint Colors — Apartment Therapy
text:
Share 
You've seen our predictions for the best colors for your kitchen in 2017 — now check out this collection of actual paints in all these intriguing hues, including navy, olive green, and dusty rose. 
GREAT BIG DISCLAIMER: Even if you're in love with a paint color when you see it on the internet, or in a simulated room on the internet, or even on a paint swatch, please, please , test it out on your wall (or at least get a great big swatch and tape it to the wall) before you paint. Color is a tricky thing, and always looks different in different rooms (and even at different times of day), and you don't want to have to paint twice. Don't believe me? Read this . (Image credit: As linked)
